HAL_AdcDescriptor_t Struct Reference

ADC configuration parameters. More...

#include <adc.h>

Data Fields

HalAdcService_t service
 ADC service field - contains variables for ADC module's internal needs.
AdcHwChannel_t tty
 tty - ADC_HW_CHANNEL_n to be used. "n" range depends on the platform. See the halAdc.h platform-specific file fore more details.
HAL_AdcResolution_t resolution
 Conversion resolution. May be chosen from:
RESOLUTION_8_BIT
RESOLUTION_10_BIT (only for AVR and ARM)
RESOLUTION_12_BIT (only for XMEGA)
HAL_AdcSampleRate_t sampleRate
 ADC sample rate. See the halAdc.h platform-specific file fore more details.
HAL_AdcVoltageReference_t voltageReference
 ADC voltage reference selections (only for AVR and XMEGA) May be chosen from:
.
volatile void * bufferPointer
 Pointer to application data.
volatile uint16_t selectionsAmount
 The number of samples (buffer cells)
void(* callback )(void)
 Pointer to a callback function that is going to be called after all conversions. Must not be set to NULL.
uint8_t corrEn
uint8_t sampleNum
uint8_t adjRes
uint8_t sampTime

ADC configuration parameters.

Field Documentation

HAL_AdcVoltageReference_t HAL_AdcDescriptor_t::voltageReference

ADC voltage reference selections (only for AVR and XMEGA) May be chosen from:
.

  • for AVR hardware platform:
    AREF
    AVCC
    INTERNAL_1d1V
    INTERNAL_2d56V
  • for XMEGA hardware platform:
    INTERNAL_1V
    INTERNAL_VCCdiv1d6V
    AREFA
    AREFB
